item.title: Lab 3: Demo in class Friday March 15
item.description:
As mentioned in class on March 11, the hand-in for Lab 3 will be on Friday March 15. Demos will start at the beginning of class. Come to class prepared to show your progress.

The deadline to submit your scripts for Lab 3 code remains midnight on Friday.

If you have not completed the lab by Friday morning, you will get partial marks up to whatever you have completed.

Let me know if you have any questions! (by Teams preferably)

Back to top

item.title: Website updates
item.description:
Hey everyone,

I’ve made a few changes to the course website, some of which are worth emphasizing because I think they’ll be particularly useful to you:

  • Course Calendar: The defunct Calendar page is now being maintained. Check this page for upcoming lecture/lab activity, particularly for Lab demo deadlines. I will keep it maintained throughout the rest of the semester.
  • Announcements: Announcements like this one will be posted on the course website and (sort-of) automatically posted on Moodle as well. If you like RSS, you can subcribe using the icon in the nav bar.
  • Lecture index: I’ve fixed some metadata and theming issues for the Topics page (also called Lectures). Here you can find an index of every course lecture, and sort them by category. This should help keep track of topics and things learned.

Let me know if you have any questions, or if there’s something that doesn’t seem to work.

Back to top
